intro: Dieffenbachia elegans, commonly known as the White Knight Dieffenbachia, is a tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, broad, arrow-shaped leaves that are typically white with green veins. The plant is a member of the Araceae family, which includes other popular houseplants like peace lilies. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires moderate watering to prevent root rot. Its foliage makes it a popular choice for indoor decoration due to its aesthetic appeal.
